Class Fusion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fusion

  • public class Fusion
extends Object
    Manages the fusion for all types except the overlayfusion
    Author:
    Stephan Preibisch (stephan.preibisch@gmx.de)

        dimensionality -

        protected static <T extends mpicbg.imglib.type.numeric.RealType<T>> void writeBlock(mpicbg.imglib.image.Image<T> outputSlice,

        transform - - the transformation

      • estimateBounds

        public static void estimateBounds(float[] offset,
                                  int[] size,
                                  List<ij.ImagePlus> images,
                                  ArrayList<mpicbg.models.InvertibleBoundable> models,
                                  int dimensionality)
        Estimate the bounds of the output image. If there are more models than images, we assume that this encodes for more timepoints. E.g. 2 Images and 10 models would mean 5 timepoints. The arrangement of the models should be as follows: image1 timepoint1 image2 timepoint1 image1 timepoint2 ... image2 timepoint5
        Parameters:
        offset - - the offset, will be computed
        size - - the size, will be computed
        images - - all imageplus in a list
        models - - all models
        dimensionality - - which dimensionality (2 or 3)

      • estimateBounds

        public static void estimateBounds(float[] offset,
                                  int[] size,
                                  int[][] imgSizes,
                                  ArrayList<mpicbg.models.InvertibleBoundable> models,
                                  int dimensionality)
        Estimate the bounds of the output image. If there are more models than images, we assume that this encodes for more timepoints. E.g. 2 Images and 10 models would mean 5 timepoints. The arrangement of the models should be as follows: image1 timepoint1 image2 timepoint1 image1 timepoint2 ... image2 timepoint5
        Parameters:
        offset - - the offset, will be computed
        size - - the size, will be computed
        imgSizes - - the dimensions of all input images imgSizes[ image ][ x, y, (z) ]
        models - - all models
        dimensionality - - which dimensionality (2 or 3)

        public static void main(String[] args)
